title: Print, "Paper Doll Costume in Black over Checked Pink Skirt", 1840–60
medium: Lithograph, brush and watercolor on cream heavy wove paper
description: This ensemble consists of a black outer layer with a white lace collar and inner sleeves, over a pink, checked full skirt. She holds a bouquet of flowers in her right  hand. Both back and front of the outfit is represented.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Paper Doll Costume in Black over Checked Pink Skirt", 1840–60.
1840–60. Lithograph, brush and watercolor on cream heavy wove paper. Gift of Grace Lincoln Temple. 1937-22-13.
